channel.title: Juhee Sung-Schenck on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Juhee Sung-Schenck on Home

item.title: NLP: Clustering - Disaster Mapping
item.description: Web scraped tweets from various disasters including earthquakes, hurricanes, and wildfires Constructed several functions to engineer features and to produce geolocation within given radius Designed a supervised learning model that distinguishes whether the tweet is related to a disaster with 89% accuracy score, and an unsupervised learning model with 85% Designed an application with Flask to correctly pinpoint the area on the map with keywords provided by users Link to this project’s GitHub repository

item.title: Reddit Classification
item.description: Generated an unstructured dataset by scraping 6,000 reddit posts in 2 subreddits Used natural language processing transformers to make the dataset mathematically analyzable and interpretable Identified most commonly used words in each subreddit using word vectorizers Built a multinomial Naive Bayes classification model with a precision score of 92% Link to this project’s GitHub repository
